job_title: Coop Software Developer in Victoria, BC
pros:
-Lovely place to work as coworkers are thoughtful and helpful towards new members.
-You feel that the work there really matters as you can deliver your products and see the end users happy with the work you do.
cons: - The salary was really low compared to other coop positions in the area.

pros: Excellent experience with great staff and awesome projects.  I was mostly responsible for fabrication of sensors and soldering of surface mount PCBs for their projects.
cons: small operation, slightly disorganized as many projects were on the go.

pros: Very innovative and exciting to serve those who need help in Canada, including people who suffer from visual impairment.
cons: The city of VIctoria has great sights in summer, but not that much in winter.
